Up to 16 players can build or play together in Creative. Every day new games are showcased in the Welcome Hub. Click ‘Change’ to access this menu.<br />\n<br />\nStep 2: Press Play, then select ‘Island Code’ and press enter.<br />\n<br />\nStep 3: Type in the code on this screen and press Launch to start the game.<br />\n<br />\nOptional: Alternatively, you can walk up to any featured island in the Welcome Hub and enter the code there. Please try again in 24 hours.</h3>\n"},"promoDisabledContent":{"_type":"Disney Plus Promo - Info View","content":"<h3>Sorry, the Disney+ offer from Fortnite ended on January 31, 2021 and is no longer able to be redeemed.</h3>\n"},"retryContent":{"_type":"Disney Plus Promo - Info View","content":"<h3>Sorry, there was an unexpected error please retry</h3>\n\n<p style=\"text-align:center\"><a class=\"buttonRetry\" href=\"https://help.disneyplus.com/csp\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\" target=\"_blank\">RETRY</a></p>\n"},"faqContent":{"_type":"Disney Plus Promo - Info View","content":"<h1>Get Two Months of Disney+ On Us!</h1>\n\n<p>Beginning November 10th @ 7 pm ET through December 31, 2020, get 2 months of Disney+ on us when you purchase V-Bucks or make any real money purchase in Fortnite -- like the currently available Street Serpent Pack. Purchased something earlier this month? We’ve got you covered. If you made any real-money purchases in Fortnite from November 6th @ 10 AM ET, including purchasing V-Bucks, you’re still eligible. Just visit fortnite.com/disneyplus beginning November 10th @ 7 pm ET to redeem your subscription. <br />\n<br />\nThis offer is open to new Disney+ subscribers aged 18+ only. Select countries only and the offer varies by country. NOTE: This offer is not available for France, Monaco, Japan, the Middle East, Brazil, Latin America, Korea, Turkey, and Russia. See the FAQ below for a full list of participating countries and territories. </p>\n\n<h2><br />\nFAQ</h2>\n\n<h2><br />\nDo real-money purchases include the purchase of V-Bucks?</h2>\n\n<p>Yes, purchasing any quantity of V-Bucks (regardless of how you purchase your V-Bucks, including via a credit card payment in-game or by redeeming a V-Bucks card you purchased at a retail outlet like Target or Wal-Mart)  is considered a real-money purchase.  Please note that purchases made <strong>using</strong> V-Bucks are not eligible. <br />\n </p>\n\n<h2>I made a real-money purchase. How do I set up Disney+?</h2>\n\n<p>After making a real-money purchase, please visit fortnite.com/disneyplus and follow the steps to redeem your Disney+ offer. Eligible new Disney+ subscribers will be required to set up a Disney+ account, agree to the Disney+ subscriber agreement, and provide a valid payment method. You must be 18 years of age or older to redeem this offer and set up a Disney+ account. If you need any help setting up your Disney+ account, please visit Disney+ customer support <a href=\"https://help.disneyplus.com/csp\">here</a>. <br />\n </p>\n\n<h2>Where is this offer available?</h2>\n\n<p>The Disney+ offer from Fortnite is only available to players in the following participating territories: Australia, Austria, Belgium, Canada, Denmark, Finland, Germany, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, New Zealand, Norway, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, UK, and United States. Please note that players in Germany are only eligible for a one month trial of Disney+.  </p>\n\n<h2><br />\nCan I get multiple Disney+ offer codes if I make multiple real-money purchases in Fortnite?</h2>\n\n<p>Sorry, the offer is limited to only one Disney+ offer code per eligible Fortnite account.<br />\n </p>\n\n<h2>What happens when the Disney+ offer period from Fortnite ends? </h2>\n\n<p>Once your offer period concludes, you'll be able to continue enjoying Disney+ as a paid service. NOTE THAT THIS LINK WILL TAKE YOU TO THE DISNEY+ REDEMPTION SITE.</h3>\n\n<p>Please select your country of residence to confirm if the Disney+ promotional offer is available in your territory.</p>\n"}},"SafetySecurityStore":{"data":{"image":"https://cdn2.unrealengine.com/Fortnite%2FSafetySecurity%2FFN_privacyHeader-1920x1080-6b5acbb6b4da6e3b360983d060c15aebe8607312.jpg","_metaTags":"","_title":"Safety and Security","Title":"Epic Games - Safety and Security","_noIndex":false,"_images_":["https://cdn2.unrealengine.com/Fortnite%2FSafetySecurity%2FFN_privacyHeader-1920x1080-6b5acbb6b4da6e3b360983d060c15aebe8607312.jpg"],"content":"<h1>Fortnite - Safety and Security</h1>\n\n<p>When you’re playing Epic Games titles or using our services, we want you to have fun. Part of that is staying safe and ensuring you have a secure account. Below, you’ll find a few ways you can increase security for your Fortnite account as well as a few tools you can use to help you stay safe when gaming. </p>\n\n<h2><br />\nProtect Your Account: Two-Factor Authentication</h2>\n\n<p>Keep your password safe and prevent your account from being compromised. We’ve implemented Two-Factor Authentication (also known as 2FA or 2-step verification) to help you prevent unauthorized account access. As a reward for protecting your account by enabling 2FA, you’ll unlock the Boogiedown Emote in Fortnite Battle Royale as well as 50 Armory Slots, 10 Backpack Slots, and 1 Legendary Troll Stash Llama in Save the World.<br />\n<br />\nFor help with turning on 2FA, check out our how-to video or read our support article on <a href=\"https://www.epicgames.com/help/epic-accounts-c74/account-security-c112/twofactor-authentication-and-how-to-enable-it-a3218\">how to enable 2FA</a>.</p>\n \n\n<div class=\"embed-responsive embed-responsive-16by9\"><iframe allowfullscreen=\"true\" class=\"embed-responsive-item\" frameborder=\"0\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/_ZpW3Nq43S0\" width=\"100%\"></iframe></div>\n\n<h2><br />\nProtect Your Account: Never Share Your Account Details</h2>\n\n<p>We’ve seen several instances of account theft and fraud related to websites that claim to provide you free V-Bucks, cosmetics, or the ability to share or buy accounts. Please never share your Epic account details with anyone. Groups claiming to provide special Fortnite deals when you enter your login credentials are fraudulent — and may steal your account. Also, please note that <strong>Epic will never ask you for your password</strong>. </p>\n\n<h2><br />\nParental Controls</h2>\n\n<p>Read all the details about setting up parental controls in Fortnite in our <a href=\"https://www.epicgames.com/fortnite/parental-controls\">Fortnite parental controls guide</a>. Fortnite offers a range of parental controls to help you manage what a player can see and do within Fortnite. In addition to the parental controls within Fortnite, you can set rules for what features a player can access on consoles, handhelds, phones, and computers. <a href=\"https://www.playstation.com/support/account/ps5-parental-controls-spending-limits/\" target=\"_blank\">PlayStation 5</a>, <a href=\"http://support.playstation.com/s/article/PS4-Parental-Controls\" target=\"_blank\">PlayStation 4</a>, <a href=\"https://support.xbox.com/help/family-online-safety/browse\" target=\"_blank\">Xbox</a>, <a href=\"https://www.nintendo.com/switch/parental-controls/\">Nintendo Switch</a>, <a href=\"https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/help/12439/microsoft-account-set-content-restrictions-on-windows-10-and-xbox-one\">Windows 10</a>, and <a href=\"https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT201304\">iOS</a> all have guides for activating parental controls.</p>\n\n<h2><br />\nReporting Bad Behavior</h2>\n\n<p>It’s important that Fortnite players have a fun and friendly community to participate with, so we take bad behavior seriously. All our community policies can be found in our <a href=\"https://www.epicgames.com/fortnite/news/fortnite-code-of-conduct\">Code of Conduct</a>. If you see someone breaking our Code of Conduct or behaving badly, you can report the player’s behavior using the Report Player option in Fortnite. For assistance with this, follow the steps in our guide on <a href=\"https://www.epicgames.com/help/fortnite-c75/battle-royale-c93/how-do-i-report-bad-player-behavior-in-fortnite-a3276\">reporting bad player behavior</a>.<br />\n<br />\nWe’d love to hear from you if you feel there’s something we can do to help make the Fortnite community more friendly and fun! You can send in suggestions to us on our official social channels, which you can find in the Community section of our <a href=\"https://www.epicgames.com/fortnite/faq\">Fortnite FAQ</a>.</p>\n\n<h2><br />\nDon’t Buy, Sell, or Trade Fortnite Accounts</h2>\n\n<p>Fortnite accounts must be set up by yourself or a parent/guardian through the game or <a href=\"https://www.epicgames.com/fortnite/home\">signing up through Epic</a>. As tempting as it might be to purchase an account with highly-coveted items, buying, selling, or trading accounts violates our <a href=\"https://www.epicgames.com/site/tos\">Terms of Service</a> and presents a security risk for your personal information and accounts.</p>\n\n<h2><br />\nAvoid Scams for Free V-Bucks and Outfits</h2>\n\n<p>Across the internet, there are third parties trying to get your private information by tricking you into believing they will provide you with free items or V-Bucks. Use caution when participating in competitions and giveaways from third parties. Also, please note that Epic will never ask you to provide private information to compete in competitions. Epic only asks you to provide private information to claim prizes after you have won (via our secure partner).</p>\n\n<h3><br />\nSocial Media Scams</h3>\n\n<p>We are aware of a number of Creators in the Support-A-Creator program making content designed to scam and defraud players, and we’re taking actions to both remove these Creators from the ecosystem and prevent similar scams in the future. <br />\n<br />\nTypically, these individuals create social media material that promises false special benefits to players in return for using a specific Support-A-Creator code. Another common scam involves Creative islands that promise rewards to players like free V-Bucks gift cards. The players that use these codes never receive the special benefits they were promised by the Creator.<br />\n<br />\nCreators cannot provide Outfit or free V-Bucks rewards for using a Creator code. Making content aimed to scam and defraud players is a violation of Creators’ agreement with Epic Games. Penalties for these violations include removal from the Support-A-Creator program and cancellation of any pending or potential payments. <br />\n<br />\nWe take violations of the Terms of Service and Code of Conduct seriously — and are looking at additional measures to prevent bad actors from abusing the program. To report scam content, please <a href=\"https://www.epicgames.com/help/contact-us?metadata=eyJoaXN0b3J5TGlua3MiOlt7InVybCI6Ii9mb3J0bml0ZS1jNzUiLCJ0aXRsZSI6IkZvcnRuaXRlIn1dLCJjYXRlZ29yeUlkIjo3NX0%3D\">submit a Player Support ticket</a> and add the hashtag <strong>#reportacreator</strong>. A screenshot of the Creator code and link to the content is required for us to investigate. A video is even better.</p>\n\n<h2><br />\nVoice Chat Controls</h2>\n\n<p>Voice chat allows you to speak to and hear from other players in Fortnite. Voice chat is enabled by default. If you don’t want other players to be able to chat with you, you can <a href=\"https://epicgames.helpshift.com/a/fortnite/?s=battle-royale&f=how-do-i-change-the-settings-for-voice-chat-in-fortnite\">learn how to disable voice chat or temporarily mute yourself</a>.</p>\n\n<h2><br />\nHouseparty Video Chat Controls</h2>\n\n<p>With the <a href=\"https://houseparty.com/\" target=\"_blank\">Houseparty</a> app, players on PC, PlayStation 5, and PlayStation 4 are able to video chat in Fortnite with players in their Houseparty “room.” <a href=\"https://www.epicgames.com/fortnite/news/houseparty-brings-video-chat-to-fortnite\" target=\"_blank\">Learn all about the safety controls for the Houseparty video chat feature</a>, such as blocking, reporting, privacy, and more. This feature can be turned on or off using the <a href=\"https://www.epicgames.com/fortnite/parental-controls#Parental%20Controls%20Within%20Fortnite\" target=\"_blank\">parental controls within Fortnite</a>.</p>\n\n<h2><br />\nLobby Controls</h2>\n\n<p>You can control your party and voice chat settings right from the Fortnite Lobby. If you need help, you can follow the steps in our guide about <a href=\"https://www.epicgames.com/help/fortnite-c75/battle-royale-c93/how-do-i-manage-my-party-and-voice-chat-options-from-the-fortnite-lobby-a3477\">managing party and voice chat options in the Lobby</a>.</p>\n","_urlPattern":"/safety-and-security","_slug":"safety-and-security","_activeDate":"2019-08-01T15:37:55.768Z","lastModified":"2021-03-16T08:09:19.856Z","_locale":"en-US","_id":"e70bd94f-6c4f-4896-87ad-aa91f2d3064f","_templateName":"blankPageHeaderImage"}},"SecureAccountStore":{"data":{"image":"https://cdn2.unrealengine.com/Fortnite%2Fsecure-your-fortnite-account%2F09BR_Evergreens_Yellow_NewsHeader-1920x1080-9fe09d7770e5b4521e4c46f490366a98b3bc28d4.jpg","_metaTags":"","metaTitle":"How to Secure Your Fortnite Account | Epic Games Account Help","_title":"secure-your-fortnite-account","Title":"How to Secure Your Fortnite Account | Epic Games Account Help","metaImage":"https://cdn2.unrealengine.com/Fortnite%2Fsecure-your-fortnite-account%2F09BR_Evergreens_Yellow_NewsHeader-1920x1080-9fe09d7770e5b4521e4c46f490366a98b3bc28d4.jpg","metaDescription":"With a secure account, you minimize risk of others using your payment methods, behaving badly in your games, and/or doing more damaging actions. Learn more.","_images_":["https://cdn2.unrealengine.com/Fortnite%2Fsecure-your-fortnite-account%2F09BR_Evergreens_Yellow_NewsHeader-1920x1080-9fe09d7770e5b4521e4c46f490366a98b3bc28d4.jpg"],"content":"<h1>Epic Games Account Help: How to Secure Your Fortnite Account</h1>\n\n<p>As a Fortnite player and Epic Games account owner, it is in your best interest to prevent others from logging into your account. By keeping your account secure, you minimize the risk of others using your payment methods to make purchases, behaving in your games in a manner that results in a ban, and/or doing more damaging actions.<br />\n </p>\n\n<h2>How can I have the best Fortnite Account Security?</h2>\nEnabling Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA) is one of the best ways to keep your account secure. With MFA, access to your Fortnite account requires the entry of not only your username and password but also a security code that expires after a short time and can only be used once. Because this extra information is required, it becomes more difficult for others to access your account.<br />\n<br />\nBelow are the situations in which logging into your account requires a security code when you have MFA enabled:\n<ul>\n\t<li>When logging into your account for the first time after MFA is enabled on the account.</li>\n\t<li>When logging into your account on a new device.</li>\n\t<li>After 30 days of no sign-ins on your account.</li>\n\t<li>After clearing cookies on the browser on which your account was being used.</li>\n</ul>\n \n\n<h2>How do I enable MFA on my Fortnite Account?</h2>\nTo enable MFA, take the following steps:\n\n<ul>\n\t<li>Be sure the email address associated with your Epic Games account is verified.</li>\n\t<li>Go to your “Account” page.</li>\n\t<li>Select “Password & Security.”</li>\n\t<li>Scroll down to the “Two-Factor Authentication” section.</li>\n\t<li>Choose your preferred method for receiving your security codes.</li>\n</ul>\nIf you choose to use the Authenticator App method, please note some of the common authenticator apps that Epic Games supports:\n\n<ul>\n\t<li>Google Authenticator</li>\n\t<li>LastPass Authenticator</li>\n\t<li>Microsoft Authenticator</li>\n\t<li>Authy</li>\n</ul>\nFor those who choose to use an authenticator app, it is a good idea to click the “Get Backup Codes” button in the “Authenticator App” subsection. Pressing this button will generate codes you can use as security codes in the event you lose access to your authenticator app. Make sure to take note of these.<br />\n<br />\nIf you choose to use the Email Authentication method, each attempt to log into your account that requires a security code will prompt the correct code to be sent to you via email.<br />\n \n<h2>What else can I do to keep my account secure?</h2>\nTo further keep your Epic account secure, you should use a password unique from those of your other online accounts and make sure to keep it a secret, even from somebody or something claiming to represent Epic Games; Epic Games will never ask you for your password.\n\n<h2> </h2>\n","_urlPattern":"/secure-your-fortnite-account","_slug":"secure-your-fortnite-account","_activeDate":"2019-08-01T15:37:55.768Z","lastModified":"2019-09-04T20:38:34.909Z","_locale":"en-US","_id":"749594f9-09fb-42a4-8786-c6165c7fec07","_templateName":"blankPageHeaderImage"}},"RedeemPageStore":{"enablePosa":true,"description":"Enter Your Code Below To Get Started","_title":"redeem-code","posaContent":{"image":"https://cdn2.unrealengine.com/Fortnite%2Fredeem-code%2FCards-1027x849-4c90850f85bf69d945451f2d8af9e6f1d3d661d5.png","needHelp":"Need Help with your code?<br />\n<a href=\"https://epicgames.helpshift.com/a/fortnite/?s=v-bucks-cards\">Go Here</a>","_type":"POSA Redeem Card","redeemLink":"<a href=\"/fortnite/vbuckscard\">Go Here To Redeem</a>","title":"<h1>Have a code for V-Bucks?</h1>\n"},"title":"Redeem Your Reward","_noIndex":false,"_images_":["https://cdn2.unrealengine.com/Fortnite%2Fredeem-code%2FCards-1027x849-4c90850f85bf69d945451f2d8af9e6f1d3d661d5.png","https://cdn2.unrealengine.com/Fortnite%2Fredeem-code%2FBG-3840x2290-f9a79c0b0acce8ea1dd3784d8ae96ea1efa91fa4.jpg","https://cdn2.unrealengine.com/Fortnite%2Fredeem-code%2FBG-Mobile-1500x2833-bcaa95c539051c634b5ac60e6de0906b5c3340ec.jpg","https://cdn2.unrealengine.com/Fortnite%2Fredeem-code%2FRedeemACode_MechTeamLeader-%281%29-2617x3834-4430f980bb4b3a49892c9a06ef706809c8236574.png"],"content":"Having trouble? What’s that mean? Well, it caused a number of issues for our games and services. And if you were playing Fortnite at the time, it likely impacted your Epic account’s ability to authenticate, and ultimately, your ability to play the game.<br />\n<br />\nWhile the issue was resolved in a matter of hours, understanding the issue is paramount to our team. Whether it’s an expired certificate, a server outage, or other issues that impact your experience, it’s important we understand why issues occur, how to resolve them, and what we can do in the future to avoid further issues. <br />\n<br />\nSpecifically with this issue, we thought many of you might be interested in reading our <a href=\"http://www.epicgames.com/site/expiration-date-4-6-2021\" target=\"_blank\">detailed certificate expiration technical report</a>.<br />\n<br />\nThanks for reading and supporting Fortnite!</p>\n","featured":false,"date":"2021-04-16T17:50:00.000Z","link":"777f88f4-0836-420a-8542-d2481c60470a","_id":"777f88f4-0836-420a-8542-d2481c60470a","pageMapping":"777f88f4-0836-420a-8542-d2481c60470a","slug":"april-6-technical-service-outage-report","urlPattern":"/blog/april-6-technical-service-outage-report","locale":"en-US","noIndex":false,"_script":"undefined","category":[],"tags":[],"_metaTags":"<meta name=\"description\" content=\"On April 6, 2021 Fortnite experienced a technical service outage. This offer can only be redeemed on a Spotify account that has never held the Premium status. Limits Apply.<br />\n<br />\nWith Spotify Premium, you not only get access to millions of songs and podcasts, but you also get the following premium benefits:</p>\n\n<ul>\n\t<li aria-level=\"1\">Premium members can download music to their device</li>\n\t<li aria-level=\"1\">No ad interruptions and unlimited skips</li>\n\t<li aria-level=\"1\">Play any song</li>\n</ul>\n\n<p>Already subscribe to Fortnite Crew earlier this month? We’ve got you covered! If you had an active Fortnite Crew subscription between March 22, 2021 and April 22, 2021 @ 8 PM ET, then you’re still eligible. Starting on April 22, 2021 @ 8 pm ET, you'll able to redeem your subscription. </p>\n\n<h2><br />\nSpotify Premium FAQ</h2>\n\n<h3>WHERE IS THIS OFFER AVAILABLE?</h3>\n\n<p>The Spotify Premium offer from Fortnite is only available to players in the following participating territories: Australia, Belgium, Chile, Colombia, France, Germany, Indonesia, Ireland, Israel, Italy, Japan, Mexico, Peru, Philippines, Poland, Russia, Thailand, Turkey, Ukraine, United Kingdom, United States, and Vietnam.</p>\n\n<h3><br />\nWHAT HAPPENS WHEN THE SPOTIFY PREMIUM OFFER PERIOD FROM FORTNITE ENDS? </h3>\n\n<p>Once your free offer period concludes, you'll be able to continue enjoying Spotify Premium as a paid service. You'll automatically be charged the standard monthly rate for a <a href=\"https://www.spotify.com/us/premium/\">Spotify Premium subscription</a> in your market, unless you cancel your subscription. You can <a href=\"https://support.spotify.com/us/article/how-to-cancel-your-subscription/\">cancel Spotify Premium</a> at any time. </p>\n\n<h3><br />\nHOW DO I CANCEL MY SPOTIFY PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION BEFORE THE OFFER PERIOD ENDS, SO THAT I’M NOT CHARGED? </h3>\n\n<p>Before the end of your three month offer period, simply follow <a href=\"https://support.spotify.com/article/cancel-premium/\" target=\"_blank\">these steps</a> to cancel your Spotify Premium subscription. If you have any questions about the cancellation process, visit <a href=\"https://support.spotify.com\" target=\"_blank\">Spotify’s support page</a>.</p>\n\n<h3><br />\nIF I CANCEL MY SPOTIFY PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION BEFORE THE OFFER PERIOD ENDS, DO I STILL GET TO ENJOY THE FULL OFFER PERIOD?</h3>\n\n<p>Yes! Even if you cancel your subscription before the offer period concludes, you’ll still get to enjoy Spotify Premium for the full length of the offer period. </p>\n\n<h3><br />\nCAN I ADD 3-MONTHS OF SPOTIFY PREMIUM TO A SPOTIFY ACCOUNT THAT ALREADY HAS OR PREVIOUSLY HAD SPOTIFY PREMIUM?</h3>\n\n<p>This offer is only available for first-time subscribers to Spotify Premium - accounts that currently or previously included Spotify Premium are not eligible. </p>\n\n<h3><br />\nCAN I USE THIS OFFER ON A FAMILY / DUO / STUDENT SPOTIFY ACCOUNT?</h3>\n\n<p>This offer is not eligible on Family, Duo, or Student Spotify accounts.</p>\n\n<h3><br />\nI RECEIVED AN ERROR CODE WHEN ATTEMPTING TO REDEEM MY CODE. WHAT DO I DO?</h3>\n\n<p>If you’re receiving an error code when attempting to redeem your code, please reach out to Spotify <a href=\"https://support.spotify.com/us/contact-spotify-support/\">here</a>.</p>\n\n<h3><br />\nDOES MY SPOTIFY PREMIUM OFFER CODE EXPIRE?</h3>\n\n<p>All codes expire on August 1st, 2021. Be sure to redeem your code before the expiration date to get your first 3-months of Spotify Premium for free<br />\n </p>\n\n<hr /><br />\n*Offer valid on qualifying Fortnite Crew Subscriptions purchases made between March 22, 2021 at 8 PM ET and June 30, 2021 at 8 PM ET for Fortnite Crew Members 18+ (13+ with guardian/parent consent).  Must redeem with Spotify by July 31, 2021. Select countries only. Spotify payment method required.  Offer applied to Spotify Premium Individual. Please see <a href=\"https://www.spotify.com/us/premium/\">https://www.spotify.com/us/premium/</a> for price after the free offer expires. Cancel anytime.  Only open to players who haven't tried Spotify Premium before.  Spotify <a href=\"https://www.spotify.com/us/legal/premium-promotional-offer-terms/\">Terms apply</a>.","featured":false,"date":"2021-04-16T13:04:00.000Z","link":"2f40fe6a-6de7-455b-82fa-f94ed88db8b1","_id":"2f40fe6a-6de7-455b-82fa-f94ed88db8b1","pageMapping":"2f40fe6a-6de7-455b-82fa-f94ed88db8b1","slug":"first-3-months-of-spotify-premium-for-free-for-new-spotify-premium-members-with-fortnite-crew","urlPattern":"/blog/first-3-months-of-spotify-premium-for-free-for-new-spotify-premium-members-with-fortnite-crew","locale":"en-US","noIndex":false,"_script":"undefined","category":[],"tags":[],"_metaTags":"<meta name=\"description\" content=\"Get the first 3-Months of Spotify Premium for Free for New Spotify Members with Fortnite Crew. Read more details to see if you qualify.\">","catLocaleMap":{},"nextSlug":"april-6-technical-service-outage-report","prevSlug":"universes-collide-batman-fortnite-zero-point-new-limited-edition-comic-book-series-arrives-april-20"},{"trending":false,"noTopImage":false,"image":"https://cdn2.unrealengine.com/16br-social-batmanzeropointcomiccrossover-newsthumb-576x576-ffd9ac00153b.jpg","contentTypeSticky":false,"author":"The Fortnite Team","enableLightbox":false,"_type":"Common Post","shareImage":"https://cdn2.unrealengine.com/16br-social-batmanzeropointcomiccrossover-social-bundle-1920x1080-5c907bbf91a0.jpg","title":"Universes Collide: BATMAN/FORTNITE: ZERO POINT - New Limited-Edition Comic Book Series Arrives April 20","content":"<p><em>A crack splits the sky above Gotham City... a tear in reality itself. This rift pulls the Dark Knight into a bizarre and unfamiliar world, with no memory of who he is or where he came from… DC’s Batman has been drawn into Fortnite! As our hero fights to recall his past and escape an endless loop of chaos and struggle, he’ll come face-to-face with the likes of Renegade Raider, Fishstick, Bandolier, and more. While the World's Greatest Detective strives to make sense of this strange new world, he’ll uncover the shocking truth about the Island, what lies beyond the Loop, and how everything is connected to the mysterious Zero Point. Uncover secrets never before revealed in-game or anywhere else! Every fan of Batman, Fortnite, stunning art, and edge-of-your-seat excitement won't want to miss the Caped Crusader facing off against Fortnite champions on the Island in a desperate attempt to save not only himself but other familiar faces from the DC universe… and perhaps the Multiverse too!</em><br />\n<br />\n<img alt=\"Batman/Fortnite: Zero Point Issue #1\" src=\"https://cdn2.unrealengine.com/batman-fortnite-zero-point-issue-1-jpg-1988x3056-95dc54c388e7.jpg\" /></p>\n\n<h2><br />\nBatman/Fortnite: Zero Point (Issue #1)</h2>\n\n<p><em>Batman/Fortnite: Zero Point</em> #1 arrives at your favorite comics shop or digitally to <a href=\"https://www.dcuniverseinfinite.com/\" target=\"_blank\">DC UNIVERSE INFINITE</a> (US-only) on April 20, 2021. Issue #1 launches day-and-date in North America, Germany, Italy, Mexico, Brazil, Spain, and the Czech Republic; and there are plans to release the full series in Japan, Korea, and France later this fall. Following Issue #1, the next installments will arrive twice monthly in May (May 4/May 18) and June (June 1/June 15). The six-part series concludes with a thrilling finale on July 6. <br />\n<br />\nEach <strong>print</strong> issue of <em>Batman/Fortnite: Zero Point</em> will include a redeemable code for bonus DC-themed Fortnite digital items inspired by the events in the comic, starting with the new Rebirth Harley Quinn Outfit. As an additional reward, any player who redeems all six codes from each of the six comic book issues will unlock the new Armored Batman Zero Outfit! </p>\n\n<p style=\"text-align:center\"><img alt=\"Fortnite Harley Quinn Outfit\" src=\"https://cdn2.unrealengine.com/fortnite-dc-harley-quinn-outfit-1920x1080-761b87ffeec0.jpg\" /><br />\n<br />\n<em>Note: Each issue of the series, along with the codes for bonus DC-themed Fortnite digital items, will also be available to paid subscribers of <a href=\"http://www.dcuniverseinfinite.com/\" target=\"_blank\">DC UNIVERSE INFINITE</a> (US-only). <u>Codes will not be available during the free trial period of DC UNIVERSE INFINITE.</u></em></p>\n\n<p><br />\nCan’t get your hands on a print copy or live outside of the United States? We’ve got you covered. All items will also be available in the Item Shop day-and-date with each comic book’s release, with the exception of Issue #1’s Rebirth Harley Quinn Outfit. That Outfit will be available first exclusively as a part of the comic book but will release in the Item Shop later in June 2021.<br />\n<br />\nNOTE: Paid subscribers of DC UNIVERSE INFINITE (US-only) will also be able to access digital issues of <em>Batman/Fortnite: Zero Point</em> with these bonus digital codes. <u>Codes will not be available during the free trial period of DC UNIVERSE INFINITE.</u><br />\n<br />\nEach issue of <em>Batman/Fortnite: Zero Point</em> will include bold/dynamic main and variant covers from legendary artists, including the Issue #3 variant cover featuring Batman vs. Snake-Eyes from DC Publisher and Chief Creative Officer, Jim Lee. In addition to incredible main covers from artist Mikel Janín, some of comics’ most talented artists will be providing variant covers for this six-issue limited series, including Arthur Adams and Sabine Rich, Dan Mora (<em>Detective Comics</em>), and Amanda Conner (<em>Harley Quinn</em>, <em>Harley Quinn</em> <em>and the Birds of Prey</em>). <br />\n<br />\nCollectors will also want to be on the lookout for the limited-run premium variant covers, which come from Epic Games Chief Creative Officer, Donald Mustard.<br />\n<br />\n<img alt=\"BMFNZP Cv1 Premium Var\" src=\"https://cdn2.unrealengine.com/bmfnzp-cv1-premium-var-1988x3056-816155ebf255.jpg\" style=\"height:auto; width:auto\" /><br />\n<br />\n<img alt=\"BMFNZP Cv1 VAR\" src=\"https://cdn2.unrealengine.com/bmfnzp-cv1-var-1988x3056-fd105ad1d828.jpg\" style=\"height:auto; width:auto\" /></p>\n\n<h2><br />\nA Closer Look</h2>\n\n<p>Here’s a first look at Issue #1, plus a sneak peek into what to expect in Issue #2...<br />\n<br />\n<strong>Issue #1 (April 20, 2021)</strong><br />\n<br />\n<img alt=\"Batman Fortnite Zero Point Issue 1 Page\" src=\"https://cdn2.unrealengine.com/batman-fortnite-zero-point-issue-1-page-3094x4697-467f2b5618e4.jpg\" style=\"height:auto; width:auto\" /><br />\n<br />\n<strong>Issue #2 (May 4, 2021)</strong><br />\nBatman is trapped on the Island – he’s unable to speak, his memory is gone, and he has to fight to survive against the deadliest warriors of countless worlds. Can the World’s Greatest Detective escape this trap when time itself resets every 22 minutes? And will the presence of someone else from Gotham City – a familiar feline fatale – help or hinder his efforts... especially when they don’t remember each other? In another life, they were enemies, friends, and partners… but here on the Island, can they do anything but battle to the end?<br />\n<br />\n<img alt=\"BMFNZP Cv2\" src=\"https://cdn2.unrealengine.com/bmfnzp-cv2-1988x3056-bbefba5120df.jpg\" style=\"height:auto; width:auto\" /></p>\n\n<h2><br />\nRelease Schedule</h2>\n\n<p>The details are almost as numerous as Batman’s gadgets! With so much to track, here’s a rundown of the <em>Batman/Fortnite: Zero Point</em> release dates, Item Shop bonuses, and when Items will be available for purchase. This list will be updated as the storyline unfolds, so keep checking back!<br />\n </p>\n\n<div>\n<style type=\"text/css\">@media only screen and (min-width: 320px) and (max-width: 768px) {\ntable p {\n    line-height: 2rem !important;\n}\n}\n.blog-wrapper .blog-container table tr:first-child:first-child td {\n    padding: 10px;\n}\n</style>\n<table border=\"1\" cellspacing=\"0\">\n\t<colgroup>\n\t\t<col />\n\t\t<col />\n\t\t<col />\n\t\t<col />\n\t\t<col />\n\t</colgroup>\n\t<tbody>\n\t\t<tr>\n\t\t\t<td>\n\t\t\t<p>Issue #</p>\n\t\t\t</td>\n\t\t\t<td>\n\t\t\t<p> Release Date</p>\n\t\t\t</td>\n\t\t\t<td>\n\t\t\t<p>Bonus Cosmetic Bundled with Print Comic or for Paid Subscribers of DC UNIVERSE INFINITE (US-only; Not Available During Free Trial Period) </p>\n\t\t\t</td>\n\t\t\t<td>\n\t\t\t<p>Item Shop Release</p>\n\t\t\t</td>\n\t\t</tr>\n\t\t<tr>\n\t\t\t<td>\n\t\t\t<p>1</p>\n\t\t\t</td>\n\t\t\t<td>\n\t\t\t<p>April 20</p>\n\t\t\t</td>\n\t\t\t<td>\n\t\t\t<p>Rebirth Harley Quinn Outfit</p>\n\t\t\t</td>\n\t\t\t<td>\n\t\t\t<p>Rebirth Harley Quinn Outfit - June 2021</p>\n\t\t\t</td>\n\t\t</tr>\n\t\t<tr>\n\t\t\t<td>\n\t\t\t<p>2</p>\n\t\t\t</td>\n\t\t\t<td>\n\t\t\t<p>May 4</p>\n\t\t\t</td>\n\t\t\t<td>\n\t\t\t<p>To be revealed</p>\n\t\t\t</td>\n\t\t\t<td>\n\t\t\t<p>To be revealed</p>\n\t\t\t</td>\n\t\t</tr>\n\t\t<tr>\n\t\t\t<td>\n\t\t\t<p>3</p>\n\t\t\t</td>\n\t\t\t<td>\n\t\t\t<p>May 18 </p>\n\t\t\t</td>\n\t\t\t<td>\n\t\t\t<p>To be revealed </p>\n\t\t\t</td>\n\t\t\t<td>\n\t\t\t<p>To be revealed</p>\n\t\t\t</td>\n\t\t</tr>\n\t\t<tr>\n\t\t\t<td>\n\t\t\t<p>4</p>\n\t\t\t</td>\n\t\t\t<td>\n\t\t\t<p>June 1 </p>\n\t\t\t</td>\n\t\t\t<td>\n\t\t\t<p>To be revealed </p>\n\t\t\t</td>\n\t\t\t<td>\n\t\t\t<p>To be revealed</p>\n\t\t\t</td>\n\t\t</tr>\n\t\t<tr>\n\t\t\t<td>\n\t\t\t<p>5</p>\n\t\t\t</td>\n\t\t\t<td>\n\t\t\t<p>June 15</p>\n\t\t\t</td>\n\t\t\t<td>\n\t\t\t<p>To be revealed</p>\n\t\t\t</td>\n\t\t\t<td>\n\t\t\t<p>To be revealed</p>\n\t\t\t</td>\n\t\t</tr>\n\t\t<tr>\n\t\t\t<td>\n\t\t\t<p>6</p>\n\t\t\t</td>\n\t\t\t<td>\n\t\t\t<p>July 6</p>\n\t\t\t</td>\n\t\t\t<td>\n\t\t\t<p>To be revealed</p>\n\t\t\t</td>\n\t\t\t<td>\n\t\t\t<p>To be revealed</p>\n\t\t\t</td>\n\t\t</tr>\n\t</tbody>\n</table>\n</div>\n \n\n<h2>FAQ:</h2>\n\n<h3>Where are the <em>Batman/Fortnite: Zero Point</em> comics available?  </h3>\n\n<p>The series launches day-and-date in North America, Germany, Italy, Mexico, Brazil, Spain, and the Czech Republic. Please note that paid subscribers of <a href=\"http://www.dcuniverseinfinite.com/\" target=\"_blank\">DC UNIVERSE INFINITE</a> (US-only) who read the digital issues on DC UNIVERSE INFINITE and who are not in a free trial period will also receive the bonus digital codes for Fortnite items for the issues read. Additional countries in Asia, the Middle East, Africa, Europe, South America, and Latin America will also have a limited number of print comic books available. Be sure to check your preferred local comic book store for availability.   </p>\n\n<h3><br />\nI downloaded the <em>Batman/Fortnite: Zero Point</em> digital comic from a 3rd Party site (Comixology, Comics App on Google Play); can I still get my bonus digital codes for the cosmetic items?</h3>\n\n<p>Sorry, the offer for bonus digital codes is limited to print issues and to paid subscribers of <a href=\"https://www.dcuniverseinfinite.com/\">DC UNIVERSE INFINITE</a> (US-only) who are not in a free trial period.</p>\n\n<h3><br />\nHow do I redeem my code for my bonus digital item?</h3>\n \n\n<ol>\n\t<li>Visit <a href=\"http://www.epicgames.com/fortnite/redeem\" target=\"_blank\">fortnite.com/redeem</a>.</li>\n\t<li>Select Your Preferred Platform or “Sign In With Epic Games” if you already have an Epic Account.\n\t<ol>\n\t\t<li>Verify that you are logged into the correct account.</li>\n\t\t<li>You should see a display name in the upper right corner of the screen.</li>\n\t</ol>\n\t</li>\n\t<li>Enter or copy/paste the code as-is into the “Enter Access Code” text field.</li>\n\t<li>Select “REDEEM.\"</li>\n\t<li>Verify the item you are redeeming and select “ACTIVATE.\"</li>\n\t<li>Launch Fortnite with the same Epic account.</li>\n\t<li>Select Battle Royale.</li>\n\t<li>Upon loading in, you will receive a gift box showing your unlocked cosmetics. You can select EQUIP or CLAIM to close. Cosmetics will then be available in your Locker. </li>\n</ol>\n\n<div style=\"margin-left:40px\"><em>Note: Codes Expire on May 1, 2025.</em></div>\n\n<h3><br />\nI’m not located in a country where the comic book will be available; can I still get the Rebirth Harley Quinn Outfit and the other digital items from the comic book?</h3>\n\n<p>Yes, the Fortnite cosmetic items will also be available in the Item Shop. Rebirth Harley Quinn will only be available with the bonus code in the comic book beginning April 20, but she will be available in the Item Shop later this summer. All other <em>Fortnite/Batman Zero Point</em> cosmetics will be available in the Item Shop day-and-date with the bonus code in the comic book.  </p>\n\n<h3><br />\nI’m in the United States. How do I sign up for a DC UNIVERSE INFINITE subscription? </h3>\n\n<p>Visit DC UNIVERSE INFINITE at <a href=\"http://www.dcuniverseinfinite.com/\" target=\"_blank\">www.dcuniverseinfinite.com</a> and follow the on-screen instructions to set up your account. You will be charged $7.99 USD/month or $74.99 USD/year, as selected by you, plus applicable taxes. Your subscription will auto-renew each month/year, as selected by you, <u>at the then-current subscription rate</u> unless you cancel before the renewal date. DC will not issue refunds once your paid subscription begins. Instructions to cancel your DC UNIVERSE INFINITE subscription are <a href=\"https://support.dcuniverse.com/hc/en-us/articles/360001952087-How-do-I-cancel-my-subscription\">here</a>. DC UNIVERSE INFINITE is open to United States residents and is not intended for children. Be sure to check out the <a href=\"https://policies.warnerbros.com/terms/en-us/html/terms_en-us_1.2.0.html\">Warner Brothers Terms of Use</a> and <a href=\"https://policies.warnerbros.com/privacy/\" target=\"_blank\">Warner Brothers Privacy Policy</a> for full Terms and Conditions. <strong>Please note that the bonus codes for <em>Batman/Fortnite: Zero Point</em> are not included as part of the DC UNIVERSE INFINITE free trial.</strong> If you are a new DC UNIVERSE INFINITE subscriber and you wish to skip the free trial period, sign up <a href=\"https://www.dcuniverseinfinite.com/register\" target=\"_blank\">here</a> and select the monthly or annual option that does not include the free trial period.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-size:12px\">BATMAN, the DC Logo, and all related characters and elements ™ & © DC</span></p>\n","trendingImage":"https://cdn2.unrealengine.com/16br-social-batmanzeropointcomiccrossover-newsheader-1920x1080-e292f49ec4ee.jpg","sticky":false,"short":"","featured":false,"date":"2021-04-14T13:45:00.000Z","link":"32068488-a74a-4909-9f42-442193e2d231","_id":"32068488-a74a-4909-9f42-442193e2d231","pageMapping":"32068488-a74a-4909-9f42-442193e2d231","slug":"universes-collide-batman-fortnite-zero-point-new-limited-edition-comic-book-series-arrives-april-20","urlPattern":"/blog/universes-collide-batman-fortnite-zero-point-new-limited-edition-comic-book-series-arrives-april-20","locale":"en-US","noIndex":false,"_script":"undefined","category":[],"tags":[],"_metaTags":"<meta property=\"og:title\" content=\"The Batman/Fortnite: Zero Point Limited-Edition Comic Book Series\">\n<meta name=\"twitter:title\" content=\"The Batman/Fortnite: Zero Point Limited-Edition Comic Book Series\">\n<meta property=\"og:description\" content=\"The new Batman/Fortnite: Zero Point six-issue comic book series arrives April 20. Aloy & Lara Limited Time Mode will now begin its run starting the week of April 19. Stay tuned to our social channels for when players can jump in.</em><br />\n </p>\n\n<hr />\n<p><br />\nHaving honed her skills in a post-apocalyptic world ruled by machines, Aloy, is now ready to take on Fornite’s Primal season.</p>\n\n<div class=\"embed-responsive embed-responsive-16by9\"><iframe allowfullscreen=\"true\" class=\"embed-responsive-item\" frameborder=\"0\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/wZbtwA3EUAk?rel=0\" width=\"100%\"></iframe></div>\n\n<h2><br />\nItem Shop</h2>\n\n<p>Beginning April 15, 2021, Aloy's Bundle arrives and includes the Aloy Outfit, her Blaze Canister Back Bling, Aloy’s Spear Pickaxe, Glinthawk Glider, Shield-Weaver Wrap, the Heart-rizon Emote, and Aloy the Skywatcher Loading Screen (bundle only) you’re sure to love. <br />\n </p>\n\n<p style=\"text-align:center\"><img alt=\"16BR Aloy Social Cosmetics 1920x1080\" src=\"https://cdn2.unrealengine.com/16br-aloy-social-cosmetics-1920x1080-1920x1080-f9d7c811299b.jpg\" style=\"height:auto; width:auto\" /></p>\n\n<p><br />\n As a bonus to PlayStation 5 players, anyone that owns the Aloy Outfit and plays Fortnite on their PlayStation 5 will unlock the Ice Hunter Aloy Style!<br />\n </p>\n\n<h2>Aloy Cup: A Chance to Win Aloy's Bundle Early</h2>\n\n<p>Grab your bow and a partner for the Aloy Cup starting on Wednesday, April 14 -- available only on PlayStation® consoles. The top-performing teams in each region will receive the bundle before it hits the Item Shop!<br />\n </p>\n\n<p style=\"text-align:center\"><img alt=\"Fortnite Aloy Cup\" src=\"https://cdn2.unrealengine.com/fortnite-aloy-cup-1920x1080-553c45c09d3c.jpg\" style=\"height:auto; width:auto\" /></p>\n\n<p>The Aloy Cup rewards precision and mastery fitting of its namesake when utilizing the Bow. Compete against other PS4 or PS5 players to be the last one standing in each game, but eliminating opponents using a bow will earn additional points. The full breakdown for scoring is as follows:</p>\n\n<h3><br />\nPlacement</h3>\n\n<ul>\n\t<li>Victory Royale: 35 points</li>\n\t<li>2nd: 29 points</li>\n\t<li>3rd: 26 points</li>\n\t<li>4th: 24 points</li>\n\t<li>5th: 22 points</li>\n\t<li>6th: 20 points</li>\n\t<li>7th: 19 points</li>\n\t<li>8th: 18 points</li>\n\t<li>9th: 17 points</li>\n\t<li>10th: 16 points</li>\n\t<li>11th: 15 points</li>\n\t<li>12th: 14 points</li>\n\t<li>13th: 13 points</li>\n\t<li>14th: 12 points</li>\n\t<li>15th: 11 points</li>\n\t<li>16th: 10 points</li>\n\t<li>17th: 9 points</li>\n\t<li>18th: 8 points</li>\n\t<li>19th: 7 points</li>\n\t<li>20th: 6 points</li>\n\t<li>21st: 5 points</li>\n\t<li>22nd: 4 points</li>\n\t<li>23rd: 3 points</li>\n\t<li>24th: 2 points</li>\n\t<li>25th: 1 point</li>\n</ul>\n\n<h3><br />\nEliminations</h3>\n\n<ul>\n\t<li>Each Elimination: 2 Points</li>\n\t<li>Bonus for Eliminations using a bow: 8 Points</li>\n</ul>\n\n<h3><br />\nHow to Compete in the Aloy Cup</h3>\n\n<p>Grab a friend and compete this Wednesday, April 14 in the Aloy Cup available only on PlayStation® consoles. Regional start times for the Cup can be found in-game under the Compete Tab.<br />\n<br />\nYour Epic Account level must be level 30 and have<a href=\"https://www.epicgames.com/account/password?#2fa-signup\"> Two-Factor Authentication</a> enabled to participate.<br />\n<br />\nFor more information on participating, read the<a href=\"https://fn.gg/AloyCup\"> Aloy Cup Official Rules</a>. <br />\n </p>\n\n<h2>Team Up! Aloy & Lara Limited Time Mode</h2>\n\n<p>Get ready for two gaming icons to unite!<br />\n<br />\nFind your Duos partner and compete in the new Team Up! Aloy & Lara Limited Time Mode. Based around Duos, players will automatically be outfitted as either Aloy or Lara Croft in a loot-locked battle with only the craftable Bow (Aloy) and Dual Pistols (Lara) at your disposal. Keep an eye out for wildlife, master your crafting skills to upgrade your weapons and earn the ultimate Primal Victory Royale.<br />\n<br />\nThe Team Up! Aloy & Lara Limited Time Mode starts April 16 at 9am ET and ends on April 18 at 9am ET. <br />\n </p>\n\n<p style=\"text-align:center\"><img alt=\"Aloy Lara Croft Team Up LTM\" src=\"https://cdn2.unrealengine.com/aloy-lara-croft-team-up-ltm-1920x1080-33271468eb62.jpg\" style=\"height:auto; width:auto\" /><br />\n </p>\n\n<h2>Fortography: Show Your Archery Ability</h2>\n\n<p>Aloy’s arrival also marks the return of Fortography. This time around, we want to see your bow-and-arrow skills with Aloy and other characters. Share your photos with us on Twitter by using the #Fortography hashtag.</p>\n\n<p>Want your screenshot to pay even more homage to Aloy? Our friends at Guerrilla have provided a<a href=\"https://cdn2.unrealengine.com/dome-walpha-1920x1080-99b38613e661.png\"> Focus Filter file</a>. Players with image editing experience can opt to download the filter and layer on further tribute in their screenshots.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<em>©2017 Sony Interactive Entertainment Europe. World | Homebase Status Report 4.13.2021","content":"Hey Commanders,<br />\n<br />\nHomebase is back to share what’s coming this week (and next) to Fortnite Save the World. <br />\n<br />\n<em>“Earlier today there was a.. well let's just call it a \"disturbance\". Things are back to normal now, but right before we went down we heard some chaos in Clip’s workshop. We were able to grab a recording.. Take a listen, Commander.”<br />\n<br />\n- <u>Concerned</u> Homebase Survivor</em><br />\n \n<div class=\"embed-responsive embed-responsive-16by9\"><iframe allowfullscreen=\"true\" class=\"embed-responsive-item\" frameborder=\"0\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/XxFnkhAPAZE\" width=\"100%\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<img alt=\"Fortnite Save The World Mini Questline\" src=\"https://cdn2.unrealengine.com/fortnite-save-the-world-mini-questline-1920x1080-2378a1b7aa10.jpg\" style=\"height:auto; width:auto\" />\n<h2><br />\nNew Mini-Questline!</h2>\nBeginning April 16 at 8 PM ET follow Homebase’s newest Hero in their mission to join the fight against the Husky forces of evil in this new mini-questline! Complete this Questline to earn Legendary Flux, XP, and Evolution Materials.<br />\n<br />\n<img alt=\"Fortnite Save The World Quality Of Life Updates\" src=\"https://cdn2.unrealengine.com/fortnite-save-the-world-quality-of-life-updates-1920x1080-9cacda25fbbc.jpg\" style=\"height:auto; width:auto\" />\n<h2><br />\nFrom the Major’s Desk</h2>\n<em>“Recruits, I am.. once again here to update you on where we stand with our crowd controllin’ effects.<br />\n<br />\nFriendly reminder that Hero abilities and Weapons do not add the Crowd Control counter mentioned in the <a href=\"https://www.epicgames.com/fortnite/en-US/news/save-the-worlds-newest-update-2-16-2021\">previous report</a>. The only thing that adds to the counter is trap control effects.  Now here’s where the new changes come in, recruits. Five Trap control effects can still make the Husks immune.. But if they’re not hit by a controllin’ effect for at least 30 seconds then that counter will reset back to 0. This is the perfect time to send em’ back through your tunnels! However, If this immunity is reached.. it will now only last for 2 minutes rather than forever. <br />\n<br />\nI’ll keep an eye out for how Commanders fare in the field after these changes.” </em><br />\n<br />\n-Major Oswald<br />\n<br />\nBack to your regularly scheduled Homebase Status Report… Initiate!<br />\n \n<h2>Coming April 17 at 8PM ET - Grab Dashing Hare Ken and the Easter Egg Launcher from the Event Store! </h2>\n<img alt=\"Fortnite Save The World Dashing Hare Ken\" src=\"https://cdn2.unrealengine.com/fortnite-save-the-world-dashing-hare-ken-1920x1080-4331710dd31f.jpg\" style=\"height:auto; width:auto\" />\n<h2><br />\nDashing Hare Ken, ready to Eggs-terminate!</h2>\n<em>“It’s time for these husks to meet the Eggs-terminator” - Ken</em><br />\n \n<ul>\n\t<li>Standard Perk: <strong>Eggs-termination</strong>\n\n\t<ul>\n\t\t<li>Kunai Storm throws 3 egg bombs, which each deal <strong>37 base</strong> damage to nearby enemies.</li>\n\t</ul>\n\t</li>\n\t<li>Commander Perk: <strong>Eggs-termination+</strong>\n\t<ul>\n\t\t<li>Kunai Storm throws 3 egg bombs, which each deal <strong>111 base damage</strong> to nearby enemies.</li>\n\t</ul>\n\t</li>\n</ul>\n<br />\n<img alt=\"Fortnite Save The World Easter Egg Launcher\" src=\"https://cdn2.unrealengine.com/fortnite-save-the-world-easter-egg-launcher-1920x1080-aede116d6ef5.jpg\" style=\"height:auto; width:auto\" />\n<h2><br />\nEaster Egg Launcher, brings eggs-citing power</h2>\nLauncher that lobs eggs at the Husks that explode on contact! Strategically place the eggs to create festive landmines! A maximum of six eggs can be active at a time.<br />\n \n<h2>Coming April 24 at 8PM ET - Bunny Brawler Luna hops into the Event Store</h2>\n<img alt=\"Fortnite Save The World Bunny Brawler Luna\" src=\"https://cdn2.unrealengine.com/fortnite-save-the-world-bunny-brawler-luna-1920x1080-3cae72b641f4.jpg\" style=\"height:auto; width:auto\" />\n<h2><br />\nBunny Brawler Luna, Hops into battle!</h2>\n<em>“Be sure to hop into the action” - Luna</em><br />\n \n<ul>\n\t<li>Standard Perk: <strong>Eggs-plosive Entrance</strong>\n\n\t<ul>\n\t\t<li>Shockwave drops three egg bombs, which each deal <strong>54 base damage</strong> to nearby enemies.</li>\n\t</ul>\n\t</li>\n\t<li>Commander Perk:  <strong>Eggs-plosive Entrance+</strong>\n\t<ul>\n\t\t<li>Shockwave drops three egg bombs, which each deal <strong>162 base damage</strong> to nearby enemies.</li>\n\t</ul>\n\t</li>\n</ul>\n<br />\n<img alt=\"Fortnite Save The World Machinist Mina Pack En\" src=\"https://cdn2.unrealengine.com/fortnite-save-the-world-machinist-mina-pack-en-1920x1080-e7d3fcdb0d7b.jpg\" style=\"height:auto; width:auto\" />\n<h2><br />\nFinal Call! Machinist Mina Leaving Soon</h2>\n<em>“If I can't build it.. then it can't be built” - Mina</em><br />\n<br />\nDon’t forget to grab your Machinist Mina Pack! The Machinist Mina pack rotates out on <strong>April 16, 2021</strong>!<br />\n<br />\nThe Machinist Mina Pack introduces a <strong>new Hero and Outfit</strong>, the <strong>Zap-O-Max Trap schematic</strong> (Wall Dynamo variant), <strong>Tankbuilt Loader Back Bling</strong>, the <strong>Machinist Mina Challenges</strong>, and <strong>entry to Save the World</strong>. These exclusive Save the World challenges will earn you 1,000 V-Bucks and 1000 X-Ray Tickets. <br />\n<br />\n<em>Note: The Cosmetic items of this Pack will be shared through Battle Royale, Save the World and Creative game modes. This new Pack series will have no impact on existing Founder daily login rewards or their V-Bucks earned, which is exclusive to early access Founders. These outfits may appear in the item shop in the future.</em><br />\n<br />\nSee you in the field, Commanders!<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n ","featured":false,"date":"2021-04-13T04:00:00.000Z","link":"d51c06eb-6897-4238-8baa-f87b0651bec1","_id":"d51c06eb-6897-4238-8baa-f87b0651bec1","pageMapping":"d51c06eb-6897-4238-8baa-f87b0651bec1","slug":"save-the-worlds-newest-update-4-13-2021","urlPattern":"/blog/save-the-worlds-newest-update-4-13-2021","locale":"en-US","noIndex":false,"_script":"undefined","category":[],"tags":[],"_metaTags":"<meta name=\"description\" content=\"Fortnite Save the World Update: Complete the new Mini-Questline and check the Event Store for returning Heroes! Also, The Machinist Mina pack leaves soon.\">\n<meta property=\"og:title\" content=\"Returning Heroes, Weapons, and more in the Fortnite STW Update\">\n<meta name=\"twitter:title\" content=\"Returning Heroes, Weapons, and more in the Fortnite STW Update\">\n<meta property=\"og:description\" content=\"Fortnite Save the World Update: Complete the new Mini-Questline and check the Event Store for returning Heroes! Also, The Machinist Mina pack rotates out soon.\">\n<meta name=\"twitter:description\" content=\"Fortnite Save the World Update: Complete the new Mini-Questline and check the Event Store for returning Heroes! Also, The Machinist Mina pack rotates out soon.\">\n<title>Returning Heroes, Weapons, and more in the Fortnite STW Update</title>","catLocaleMap":{},"nextSlug":"aloy-arrives-in-fortnite-this-week","prevSlug":"fortnite-creative-v16-20-update-joyride-vehicles-now-in-fortnite-creative"},{"trending":false,"noTopImage":false,"image":"https://cdn2.unrealengine.com/13br-social-joyride-keyart-newsthumb-576x576-654810511.jpg","contentTypeSticky":false,"trendingImage":"https://cdn2.unrealengine.com/13br-social-joyride-keyart-newsheader-1920x1080-654808477.jpg","author":"The Fortnite Team","enableLightbox":false,"_type":"Common Post","sticky":false,"short":"","title":"Fortnite Creative v 16.20 Update - Joyride Vehicles Now in Fortnite Creative","content":"<p>Buckle up and start your engines, it’s GO TIME! </p>\nFortnite Creative’s latest update skrrrrts its way into Creative this update, bringing a collection of cool vehicles, a new Race Checkpoint device, support for 50 player games, and more!\n\n<h2>Joyride Vehicles now in Fortnite Creative!</h2>\n\n<ul>\n\t<li>Want to go fast? The Whiplash is a great choice for racing on a road track. </li>\n\t<li>Off-road more your style? Jump into the OG Bear and tear up the dirt. </li>\n\t<li>Bring your crew and squad up with four-door fun in the Prevalent.</li>\n\t<li>Honk! Honk! If you think six wheels are better than four - try out the Mudflap! </li>\n</ul>\n\n<div style=\"text-align:center\">\n<div class=\"embed-responsive embed-responsive-16by9 html5-video\">\n<video autoplay=\"autoplay\" controls=\"controls\" height=\"auto\" preload=\"metadata\" width=\"100%\"><source src=\"https://cdn2.unrealengine.com/creative-joyride-7472e5051670.mp4\" /></video>\n</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nWith the <a href=\"https://www.epicgames.com/fortnite/news/fortnite-creative-v15-50-update\">introduction of Large Islands in v15.50</a> and large matchmaking support being made widely available today, no game type is off-limits. Design your perfect 1v1 drag racecourse, a multiplayer circuit-style tournament, or even an obstacle course race track!<br />\n<br />\nJoyride vehicles can be used in more than just racing games. We’re excited to see the inventive ways you include vehicles in your game. Be sure to share your favorites #FNCreateJoyride with us on social media @FNCreate! For more information on Joyride and vehicle changes check out the Devices section below.\n<h2>Large Matchmaking Support</h2>\nThe option to create up to 50-player games is out of beta and now available to all Creators! Bring more players into your experience with more matchmaking options. Whether you are playing practice, combat, or variety games, more players mean more fun! Check the Gameplay section down below for details.\n\n<h2>Hub V2 Islands</h2>\nWe’ll be on the lookout for Featured Hubs taking advantage of our using our new hub islands: Flat Grid Hub V2 and Floating Island Hub V2. These new hub layouts feature clearer, simplified areas perfect for navigation with a single height building guide and pathways to portal areas. <br />\n<br />\nSince the building guide may take up some of your creative space, we’ve also increased the building volume for these islands to be 71x71 (compared to the previous 67x67 hubs). We can’t wait to see all of your new Welcome Hub creations!<br />\n<br />\n<strong>Note:</strong> We’re planning an additional Welcome Hub update in a future update to adjust featured portal placement -- allow us to feature new Hub V2 creations.\n\n<h2>Welcome Hub Update</h2>\nAlong new changes, we’ve removed two player portals and two event portals from the Welcome Hub in this release. This is necessary to accommodate the new XL Islands and Spatial Thermometer which are entering Beta in this release. See the Beta Testing section below for more details.\n\n<h2>Gameplay Features</h2>\n\n<ul>\n\t<li>The initial phase of Large Matchmaking Support has now left Beta and is available to everyone.  Please read the notes section below before beginning to use this feature.</li>\n\t<li>New values have been added to the Max Players option in My Island Game Settings: 20, 24, 30, 32, 40, 48, 50.\n\t<ul>\n\t\t<li><strong>IMPORTANT NOTES:</strong>\n\t\t<ul>\n\t\t\t<li>This is just the first phase of the large matchmaking support initiative, and as such, there are various issues with the way that the larger player count interacts with some devices.</li>\n\t\t\t<li>Some devices will not currently operate correctly when using Any/All as the selected value in Team-related options.</li>\n\t\t\t<li>Some devices have been observed to fail to apply settings correctly to all players in a game with 16 or more players present.</li>\n\t\t\t<li>Please be sure to test your game with larger player counts and be prepared to use workarounds for now if you find some devices behaving incorrectly.</li>\n\t\t\t<li>We are currently undertaking the task of updating all devices to support large player counts, and allowing all devices which have Team-related options to support up to 50 teams.</li>\n\t\t</ul>\n\t\t</li>\n\t</ul>\n\t</li>\n\t<li>Added a new option to My Island Game Settings:\n\t<ul>\n\t\t<li>Matchmaking Privacy: Public, Private (Default: Public).</li>\n\t\t<li>When an island is published with this option set to ‘Private’, it will immediately restrict how other people can interact with the island.\n\t\t<ul>\n\t\t\t<li>The island cannot be accessed via portals except on islands belonging to the island Creator. (i.e. the Creator can place portals pointing to the island on their own personal hubs or islands, but nobody else can).</li>\n\t\t\t<li>The island cannot be accessed via the front end code entry menu.</li>\n\t\t\t<li>The island will not appear in Recently Visited or Favorite island lists.</li>\n\t\t\t<li>The island cannot be featured on the Welcome Hub and cannot be accessed via the portals on the Welcome Hub.</li>\n\t\t</ul>\n\t\t</li>\n\t\t<li><strong>IMPORTANT:</strong> This setting is PERMANENTLY set the first time that the island is published.\n\t\t<ul>\n\t\t\t<li>You can duplicate an island which has had its privacy permissions set and freely change the setting on the duplicate until the first time it is published.</li>\n\t\t</ul>\n\t\t</li>\n\t</ul>\n\t</li>\n</ul>\n\n<h2>Feature Removals</h2>\n\n<ul>\n\t<li>The following devices have been removed from the Device Gallery:\n\t<ul>\n\t\t<li>Item Spawner Plate</li>\n\t\t<li>Player Spawn Plate</li>\n\t\t<li>Player Checkpoint Plate</li>\n\t</ul>\n\t</li>\n</ul>\n<br />\nThese devices will continue to work in all islands which already have them, but they can no longer be selected or placed from the Device Gallery. We recommend replacing these older devices with their newer counterparts where possible to ensure future compatibility.\n<ul>\n\t<li>The following devices have been removed from the Device Gallery and will not function for the time being:\n\t<ul>\n\t\t<li>ATK Spawner</li>\n\t\t<li>Quadcrasher Spawner</li>\n\t\t<li>Shopping Cart Spawner</li>\n\t\t<li>Cannon Spawner</li>\n\t</ul>\n\t</li>\n</ul>\nThese devices will not spawn their vehicles, which are currently not compatible with the updated vehicle physics. As and when these vehicles are updated, their spawners will be re-enabled or replaced with working versions.\n\n<ul>\n\t<li>The following devices have been removed from the Device Gallery and will no longer function:\n\t<ul>\n\t\t<li>B.R.U.T.E. Spawner</li>\n\t\t<li>The B.R.U.T.E. will not be updated to the new vehicle physics system and has been disabled indefinitely.</li>\n\t</ul>\n\t</li>\n</ul>\n\n<h2>New Islands</h2>\n\n<ul>\n\t<li>Added 2 new islands:\n\t<ul>\n\t\t<li>Flat Grid Hub V2 - A flat grid island used to design featured hubs.</li>\n\t\t<li>Floating Island Hub V2 - A floating island used to design featured hubs.</li>\n\t</ul>\n\t</li>\n</ul>\n\n<h2>Islands Bug Fixes</h2>\n\n<ul>\n\t<li>Fixed a collision issue on The Shark Island where a trim asset blocked player movement.</li>\n\t<li>Fixed an issue where Island images were not showing up on Matchmaking Portals.</li>\n\t<li>Fixed an issue where Template Islands did not show up in the Template Island tab.</li>\n\t<li>Fixed an issue where the Matchmaking widget was not available when players queued for a Matchmaking Portal within an LTM.</li>\n\t<li>Fixed an issue where the mini-map did not show up on the Welcome Hub or Featured Islands.</li>\n\t<li>Fixed an issue where the player map icon became offset on the mini-map when flying.</li>\n</ul>\n\n<h2>Tools Fixes</h2>\n\n<ul>\n\t<li>Fixed an issue where assets from the Island could not be added to the Quickbar.</li>\n\t<li>Fixed an issue where the Barrier Prop blueprint was inconsistent with the Phone Tool.</li>\n</ul>\n\n<h2>Prefab & Gallery Fixes</h2>\n\n<ul>\n\t<li>Fixed an issue with the Haunted Courtyard Castle having a searchable coffin asset and asset icon.</li>\n\t<li>Fixed an issue with the wooden railings from Haunted Castle Exterior Wall Gallery A giving incorrect resource materials.</li>\n\t<li>Fixed an issue with the televisions from the Arctic Base Parts Gallery displaying the wrong screen image.</li>\n</ul>\n\n<h2>Devices</h2>\n\n<ul>\n\t<li>Added new vehicle spawners: Prevalent, Taxi, Whiplash, Bear, and Mudflap.</li>\n\t<li>Converted the following vehicle spawners to work properly with the new vehicle physics: Baller, Driftboard, and Stormwing.</li>\n\t<li>For performance reasons, there’s currently a placement limit of 16 vehicle spawners per island for performance reasons.</li>\n\t<li>The new spawners* have the following options:\n\t<ul>\n\t\t<li>Enabled During Phase: None, All, Pre-Game Only, Gameplay Only (Default: All).</li>\n\t\t<li>Respawn Time: Never, Instant, 1-5 Seconds, 10 Seconds, 15 Seconds, 20 Seconds, 25 Seconds, 30 Seconds, 45 Seconds, 1 Minute, 1.5 Minutes, 2 Minutes, 3 Minutes, 4 Minutes, 5 Minutes (Default: Instant).</li>\n\t\t<li>Respawn Vehicle When Enabled: Yes, No, Only If Needed (Default: Yes).\n\t\t<ul>\n\t\t\t<li>Determines whether the spawner will spawn a new vehicle when it is enabled at game start or via channels. ‘Yes’ will spawn a new vehicle, destroying an existing one, while ‘Only If Needed’ will only spawn a new vehicle if there is no existing one currently in the game.</li>\n\t\t</ul>\n\t\t</li>\n\t\t<li>Destroy Vehicle When Disabled: Yes, No (Default: Yes).\n\t\t<ul>\n\t\t\t<li>Determines whether the spawner will destroy any existing vehicles when it is disabled via channels.</li>\n\t\t</ul>\n\t\t</li>\n\t\t<li>Owning Team: Any, 1-16 (Default: Any).\n\t\t<ul>\n\t\t\t<li>Determines which teams can use the spawned vehicle.</li>\n\t\t</ul>\n\t\t</li>\n\t\t<li>Visible In Game: On, Off (Default: On).\n\t\t<ul>\n\t\t\t<li>Determines whether the spawn pad is visible during the game.  Switching this to ‘Off’ will make the spawner invisible during gameplay and remove its collision, causing the spawned vehicle to fall through.</li>\n\t\t</ul>\n\t\t</li>\n\t\t<li>Assigns Driver When Receiving From: No Channel, 1-150 (Default: No Channel).\n\t\t<ul>\n\t\t\t<li>When the spawner receives a signal on the selected channel, it will teleport the target player into the vehicle.\n\t\t\t<ul>\n\t\t\t\t<li>If the vehicle does not already have a driver, the target player will become the driver.  </li>\n\t\t\t\t<li>If the target player is already in a vehicle, it will remove them from the old vehicle and put them in the new vehicle.</li>\n\t\t\t\t<li>If the target vehicle already has a driver from a different team, the existing driver will be ejected from the vehicle and the target player will become the driver.</li>\n\t\t\t\t<li>If the target vehicle already has a driver from the same team, the spawner will place the target player in a free passenger seat if one exists. If the vehicle has no free passenger seat, this will do nothing.</li>\n\t\t\t</ul>\n\t\t\t</li>\n\t\t</ul>\n\t\t</li>\n\t\t<li>Respawn Vehicle When Receiving From: No Channel, 1-150 (Default: No Channel).</li>\n\t\t<li>Destroy Vehicle When Receiving From: No Channel, 1-150 (Default: No Channel).</li>\n\t\t<li>Enable When Receiving From: No Channel, 1-150 (Default: No Channel).</li>\n\t\t<li>Disable When Receiving From: No Channel, 1-150 (Default: No Channel).</li>\n\t\t<li>When Player Enters Vehicle Transmit On: No Channel, 1-150 (Default: No Channel).</li>\n\t\t<li>When Player Exits Vehicle Transmit On: No Channel, 1-150 (Default: No Channel).</li>\n\t\t<li>When Vehicle Spawns Transmit On: No Channel, 1-150 (Default: No Channel).</li>\n\t\t<li>When Vehicle is Destroyed Transmit On: No Channel, 1-150 (Default: No Channel).</li>\n\t</ul>\n\t</li>\n\t<li>New spawners also include the following options:\n\t<ul>\n\t\t<li>Boost Regen: No Boost, Slow, Default, Fast, Unlimited (Default: No Boost or Default depending on vehicle type).\n\t\t<ul>\n\t\t\t<li>Determines whether the vehicle can boost, and how quickly the meter fills.</li>\n\t\t</ul>\n\t\t</li>\n\t\t<li>Radio: Enabled, Disabled (Default: Enabled).</li>\n\t\t<li>Color and Style: Random, Various (depending on vehicle type).  (Default: Random).</li>\n\t\t<li>Tire Selection: Road Tires, Off-Road Tires (Default: Road Tires)\n\t\t<ul>\n\t\t\t<li>Determines the type of tires that the vehicle will spawn with.</li>\n\t\t</ul>\n\t\t</li>\n\t</ul>\n\t</li>\n\t<li><strong>NOTE:</strong> Not all Spawners have all of these options, and some spawners may contain additional options not listed here.</li>\n\t<li><strong>Spawner Known Issues:</strong>\n\t<ul>\n\t\t<li>We've temporarily turned off the ability for the Baller tow-hook to attach to other vehicles while we address some issues.</li>\n\t\t<li>Spawners will send signals on both the When Vehicle is Destroyed and When Vehicle is Spawned channels at game start. This will be addressed in a future release.</li>\n\t\t<li>Destroying a vehicle using Destroy Vehicle When Receiving From currently causes the vehicle to despawn rather than explode.</li>\n\t\t<li>When Vehicle is Destroyed Transmit On currently waits for the destroyed vehicle to completely despawn before triggering, instead of triggering as soon as the vehicle explodes.  This will be addressed in a future release.</li>\n\t\t<li>There is an occasional bug with the Baller which can cause it to move unusually slowly.</li>\n\t\t<li>Spawners for older vehicles such as the ATK, Quadcrasher, Shopping Cart and Cannon have been temporarily disabled until their associated vehicles have been updated to work with the new physics system.</li>\n\t</ul>\n\t</li>\n\t<li>Added the Race Checkpoint device\n\t<ul>\n\t\t<li>This device allows races to be created by placing a series of checkpoints in the map.</li>\n\t\t<li>Each checkpoint has a sequence number which determines the order in which the checkpoints must be activated by players.</li>\n\t\t<li>When placing checkpoints from the quick bar, they will automatically increment their sequence number to make it easy to place a number of them in sequence. The sequence numbers can be overridden once placed if desired.</li>\n\t\t<li>Multiple checkpoints can have the same sequence number, in which case activating any of them will count and allow the player to advance.</li>\n\t\t<li>The checkpoint with the lowest sequence number will automatically become the start point for the race and the checkpoint with the highest sequence number will automatically become the end point for the race. These will alter dynamically as checkpoints are placed or sequence numbers are changed manually.</li>\n\t\t<li>This device has the following options:</li>\n\t\t<li>Checkpoint Number: Set to Highest, 1-150 (Defaults to the next highest number when placed).\n\t\t<ul>\n\t\t\t<li>If ‘Set to Highest’ is selected, when the options screen is closed the checkpoint will automatically be set to be the next highest number in the sequence, as though it had been newly placed.</li>\n\t\t</ul>\n\t\t</li>\n\t\t<li>Allow Players to Pass Without Vehicle: Yes, No (Default: Yes)\n\t\t<ul>\n\t\t\t<li>Determines whether players can activate the checkpoint on foot, or whether they must be in a vehicle. </li>\n\t\t</ul>\n\t\t</li>\n\t\t<li>Allowed Vehicles: All, None, Ground Vehicles, Air Vehicles (Default: All)\n\t\t<ul>\n\t\t\t<li>Determines which types of vehicle can be used to activate the checkpoint.</li>\n\t\t</ul>\n\t\t</li>\n\t\t<li>Inactive Checkpoint Color: Team Relationship, Team Color, White, Sky Blue, Red-Orange, Gold, Apple Green, Fuchsia, Orange, Aquamarine, Beige, Purple, Neon Green, Cerulean, Silver, Aqua, Pink, Green (Default: White)\n\t\t<ul>\n\t\t\t<li>Determines the color for checkpoints which are not the current objective and have not yet been activated. Team Relationship sets the color to Red for checkpoints belonging to enemy teams, Green for checkpoints belonging to neutral teams and Blue for checkpoints belonging to friendly teams.</li>\n\t\t</ul>\n\t\t</li>\n\t\t<li>Current Checkpoint Color: (Colors as above).\n\t\t<ul>\n\t\t\t<li>Determines the color for the checkpoint which is the current objective.</li>\n\t\t</ul>\n\t\t</li>\n\t\t<li>Completed Checkpoint Color: (Colors as above).\n\t\t<ul>\n\t\t\t<li>Determines the color for checkpoints which have already been activated.</li>\n\t\t</ul>\n\t\t</li>\n\t\t<li>Visible Prior to Race Start: No, If Start, Yes (Default: If Start).\n\t\t<ul>\n\t\t\t<li>Determines whether players can see the checkpoints before the race begins. ‘If Start’ means that the checkpoint will only be visible if it is the first checkpoint in the race.</li>\n\t\t</ul>\n\t\t</li>\n\t\t<li>Checkpoint Visible When Passed: No, Yes (Default: No).\n\t\t<ul>\n\t\t\t<li>Determines whether the checkpoint remains visible to a player once it has been activated.</li>\n\t\t</ul>\n\t\t</li>\n\t\t<li>Activating Team: Any, 1-16 (Default: Any).\n\t\t<ul>\n\t\t\t<li>Determines which team can activate the checkpoint.</li>\n\t\t</ul>\n\t\t</li>\n\t\t<li>Class Identifier: None, 1-16 (Default: None).\n\t\t<ul>\n\t\t\t<li>Determines which class can activate the checkpoint.</li>\n\t\t</ul>\n\t\t</li>\n\t\t<li>Play Audio: Yes, No (Default: Yes).\n\t\t<ul>\n\t\t\t<li>Determines whether the checkpoint will play a sound when activated.</li>\n\t\t</ul>\n\t\t</li>\n\t\t<li>Enable When Receiving From: No Channel, 1-150 (Default: No Channel).</li>\n\t\t<li>Disable When Receiving From: No Channel, 1-150 (Default: No Channel).</li>\n\t\t<li>Set As Current Checkpoint When Receiving From: No Channel, 1-150 (Default: No Channel).</li>\n\t\t<li>When Checkpoint Completed Transmit On: No Channel, 1-150 (Default: No Channel).</li>\n\t\t<li>When Checkpoint Becomes Current Transmit On: No Channel, 1-150 (Default: No Channel).</li>\n\t\t<li><strong>Known Issues:</strong>\n\t\t<ul>\n\t\t\t<li>‘None’ in the Class Identifier option actually means ‘Any’.  We will correct this in a future update and add separate values for Any Class and No Class.</li>\n\t\t</ul>\n\t\t</li>\n\t</ul>\n\t</li>\n</ul>\n\n<h2>Device and Item Fixes</h2>\n\n<ul>\n\t<li>Capture Area SFX now displays correctly when captured.</li>\n\t<li>The Flag is no longer invisible when equipped.</li>\n\t<li>Fixed an issue where the Score Manager displayed inconsistent colors with intended numbers.</li>\n\t<li>We have made changes to the way that the Billboard device displays text colors in an attempt to improve the overall look of colored text.</li>\n</ul>\n\n<h2>Beta Test</h2>\n\n<ul>\n\t<li>In this release, we are making XL Islands and the new Spatial Thermometer available to  Beta test.</li>\n\t<li>XL Islands\n\t<ul>\n\t\t<li>These islands have approximately 12x the surface area of regular islands.</li>\n\t\t<li>At this time we are releasing both a flat grid and an island terrain version for testing.</li>\n\t\t<li>Because of the size of these islands, we have had to reduce the overall number of islands accessible from the Welcome Hub.</li>\n\t</ul>\n\t</li>\n\t<li>Spatial Thermometer\n\t<ul>\n\t\t<li>The Spatial Thermometer is a new memory management system designed to allow Creators to fully exploit the large surface area of the new L and XL islands. More details will be released as development continues.</li>\n\t</ul>\n\t</li>\n</ul>\n\n<h3>Beta Testing FAQ:</h3>\n<strong>What is the purpose of the Beta testing program?</strong><br />\n<br />\nAs we continue to develop new and exciting features for Creators, we want to make sure that some of the technically challenging and impactful features we’re working on get proper testing in a live environment without risking significant impact to the live service. One way to do this is to release features to a very limited number of people for testing and feedback. Feedback and bug reports generated during testing help ensure that when the feature is released we have had a chance to fix critical issues, improve user experience and know what to expect when the feature is rolled out.<br />\n<br />\n<strong>What kind of features will be put into Beta rather than straight to release?</strong><br />\n<br />\nFeatures which have a higher technical complexity or require a significant amount of user feedback before release.<br />\n<br />\n<strong>Are most features going to be Beta tested before being released?</strong><br />\n<br />\nNo. Only features which really require targeted testing or feedback will go through the Beta process.<br />\n<br />\n<strong>How long will features remain in Beta?</strong><br />\n<br />\nWe want features to remain in Beta for the shortest amount of time possible. It’s impossible to predict exactly how long any feature will remain in Beta - and it’s always possible that a Beta feature will not be released after testing or reworked significantly. <br />\n<br />\n<strong>Can I join the Beta program?</strong><br />\n<br />\nThe number of people participating in the program is deliberately tiny. The group’s purpose is to help our team with very focused testing and provide specific feedback on the features they are testing out. We want to keep the number of people testing these features small to minimize any potential impact to the live service or any disruption to the majority of players. For this reason, we are not accepting applications to join the program at this time.\n<p> </p>\n","featured":false,"date":"2021-04-13T03:00:00.000Z","link":"a97c2009-286a-40ae-ae90-f915334b4708","_id":"a97c2009-286a-40ae-ae90-f915334b4708","pageMapping":"a97c2009-286a-40ae-ae90-f915334b4708","slug":"fortnite-creative-v16-20-update-joyride-vehicles-now-in-fortnite-creative","urlPattern":"/blog/fortnite-creative-v16-20-update-joyride-vehicles-now-in-fortnite-creative","locale":"en-US","noIndex":false,"_script":"undefined","category":[],"tags":[],"_metaTags":"<meta property=\"og:description\" content=\"Large matching support and the Fortnite Joyride Vehicles are coming to Creative! If you don’t own the Battle Pass but earned XP at Level 100, that XP will carry over once obtaining the Battle Pass and put you at the appropriate Level!<br />\n<br />\n<img alt=\"Fortnite Super Leveling Season 6 Rewards\" src=\"https://cdn2.unrealengine.com/fortnite-super-leveling-season-6-rewards-1920x1080-af81c5573237.jpg\" style=\"height:auto; width:auto\" /><br />\n<br />\nSome of you may currently be on your super leveling journey, while some of you are close to starting. So what are the super leveling rewards in Chapter 2 Season 6? Let’s go over them.</p>\n\n<h2><br />\nSeason 6 Super Leveling Rewards</h2>\n\n<p>The Spire has sent a mysterious energy influencing Tarana, Raz, and Spire Assassin, creating multiple “Relic” Styles for each: Chromium, Runic, and Golden. Below are each Style and the Levels for unlocking them:</p>\n\n<h3><br />\nChromium Styles</h3>\n\n<p>Spire-inspired, Chromium Styles are made of the metal that compose Season 6’s central monument.</p>\n\n<ul>\n\t<li>Chromium Tarana: Level 110</li>\n\t<li>Chromium Raz: Level 130</li>\n\t<li>Chromium Spire Assassin: Level 150</li>\n</ul>\n\n<p><br />\n<img alt=\"Fortnite Season 6 Chromium Tarana Raz Spire Assassin\" src=\"https://cdn2.unrealengine.com/fortnite-season-6-chromium-tarana-raz-spire-assassin-1920x1080-e48035ef4ec4.jpg\" style=\"height:auto; width:auto\" /></p>\n\n<h3><br />\nRunic Styles</h3>\n\n<p>From new fissures in the metal, Runic Styles emit a purple light representing The Spire’s energy. </p>\n\n<ul>\n\t<li>Runic Tarana: Level 160</li>\n\t<li>Runic Raz: Level 180</li>\n\t<li>Runic Spire Assassin: Level 200</li>\n</ul>\n\n<p><br />\n<img alt=\"Fortnite Season 6 Runic Tarana Raz Spire Assassin\" src=\"https://cdn2.unrealengine.com/fortnite-season-6-runic-tarana-raz-spire-assassin-1920x1080-b37380b854b9.jpg\" style=\"height:auto; width:auto\" /></p>\n\n<h3><br />\nGolden Styles</h3>\n\n<p>The purple light remains in Golden Styles, but the metal has transformed into brilliant gold. A blessing from The Spire. </p>\n\n<ul>\n\t<li>Golden Tarana: Level 205</li>\n\t<li>Golden Raz: Level 215</li>\n\t<li>Golden Spire Assassin: Level 225</li>\n</ul>\n\n<p><br />\n<img alt=\"Fortnite Season 6 Golden Tarana Raz Spire Assassin\" src=\"https://cdn2.unrealengine.com/fortnite-season-6-golden-tarana-raz-spire-assassin-1920x1080-6938fc78592d.jpg\" style=\"height:auto; width:auto\" /><br />\n<br />\nWith Season 6’s super leveling, harness the essence of the Season’s distinctive
